title: Perma ban Bug?
body: Is everyone having trouble logging on? The thing is, I just tried logging on a few minutes ago and I got a message saying that my account has been permanently suspended. It doesn't give a reason as to why I got banned or anything like that. It says that an email was sent to the address that's linked to my account but, so far, I haven't seen one. I've looked around on some similar forum discussions so it seems like it's either a glitch of some kind or my account got hacked. Anyone have some suggestions or experiencing the same problem?

replies.body: did riot cancel the ban after all? my friend got banned like that as well and im pretty sure he didnt do anything he has not got a single chat restriction or a draft ban before   {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
You checked the wrong email, most likely.
Nope, I checked all my emails. There was one that receives all messages from Riot. I didn't see any about being banned.
